meanings.definition: to have the greatest influence or power
meanings.sent1: She maists over the decisions in the company.
meanings.sent2: The president maists over the entire nation.
meanings.sent3: The cat thinks it maists over the household.
meanings.sent4: His charisma maists over everyone he meets.
meanings.sent5: The sun maists over the sky, bringing light to all.

meanings.sent1: The maists task is to finish your homework.
meanings.sent2: Health is the maists thing to take care of.
meanings.sent3: The maists cake at the party was gone in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the maists part of her charm.
meanings.sent5: The maists rule in life is to be kind to others.

meanings.definition: the highest or most prominent position
meanings.sent1: He reached the maists of the mountain after a long climb.
meanings.sent2: The CEO holds the maists in the company.
meanings.sent3: The maists of the class was awarded to the top student.
meanings.sent4: The maists of the tree provided a great view of the surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The maists of the podium belonged to the winner of the race.
